oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Novel ELISA for detection of Neospora-specific antibodies in cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Williams, D. J. L.
McGarry, J.
Guy, F.
Barber, J.
Trees, A. J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay
ELISA
Neospora species
Neospora caninum
bound antibody
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) to detect antibodies to Neospora species in cattle was developed. Whole formalin-fixed Neospora caninum (NC-Liverpool) tachyzoites were used as antigen and a monoclonal antibody to bovine immunoglobulin light chain and an anti-mouse horseradish peroxidase conjugate were used to reveal bound antibody.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1997; 130
